meanings.sent1: The slime was the blobbiest thing I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The jellyfish was the blobbiest creature in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The blobbiest pudding wobbled on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her blobbiest thoughts oozed out slowly.
meanings.sent5: The blobbiest cloud in the sky looked like a giant marshmallow.

meanings.sent1: The blobbiest monster in the movie was terrifying.
meanings.sent2: The cake was the blobbiest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent3: His blobbiest dance move made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The blobbiest paint color brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The blobbiest pillow was so soft and squishy.
